verses.name: 1 Kings 1:50
verses.text: And Adonijah feared because of Solomon, and arose, and went, and caught hold on the horns of the altar.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:51
verses.text: And it was told Solomon, saying, Behold, Adonijah feareth king Solomon: for, lo, he hath caught hold on the horns of the altar, saying, Let king Solomon swear unto me to day that he will not slay his servant with the sword.

verses.name: 1 Kings 1:52
verses.text: And Solomon said, If he will shew himself a worthy man, there shall not an hair of him fall to the earth: but if wickedness shall be found in him, he shall die.
